overview.base: You can hear all moving creatures within 30 feet. If the creature is breathing, you can hear it even if it is not moving. You can not detect silent creatures in this way.
You walk through difficult terrain at normal speed.
You resist being surprised.

Your hands count as shields for the purposes of abilities that target them (although they cannot be shattered or destroyed). You may block with them and their BV is +1.
Note: This does not make your hands blocking.
You vertically leap at quarter speed and horizontally leap at half speed.
overview.proficient: You instead vertically leap at half speed and horizontally leap at full speed.

overview.base: You always have at least 1 AV. This is the case even when you are not wearing armor.
